attributes.action: make ESP, or Electronic Stability Program, a mandatory feature on new cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to What Car? magazine, in 2005 there was a marginal drop of 1% in road fatalities in the UK, down to 3201. ESP would help drive down these figures further.

ESP is an 'active vehicle safety system' and a further enhancement to the anti-lock braking (ABS) system. ESP reduces the risk of skids and slides during cornering and helps to keep a car on track even in extreme conditions, for example on wet or icy roads.
